<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6125</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sprichwörter mit Tieren</string>
            <string language="es">Sprichwörter mit Tieren</string>
            <string language="ga">Sprichwörter mit Tieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprichwörter MIT Tieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">MIT Tieren de Sprichwörter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mit Tieren de Sprichwörter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mit Tieren di Sprichwörter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sprichwφrter mit Tieren</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learners will improve their language awareness and will practice vocabulary topic animals.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes mejorarán su apreciación del idioma y practicarán el vocabulario sobre temas de animales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Feabhsóidh foghlaimeoirí a bhfeasacht teanga agus déanfaidh siad cleachtadh ar fhoclóir a bhaineann le hainmhithe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="es">Alemán</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearmáinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger verbessern ihr Sprachenbewußtsein und 
üben Wortschatzthematiere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants amélioreront leur conscience de 
langage et pratiqueront des animaux de sujet de vocabulaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners melhorarão sua consciência da língua
e praticarão animais do tópico do vocabulário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti miglioreranno la loro consapevolezza
di linguaggio e si eserciteranno negli animali di soggetto di 
vocabolario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα βελτιώσουν τη γλωσσική συνειδητοποίησή
τους και θα ασκήσουν τα ζώα θέματος λεξιλογίου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
